entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1900 metres rising to 2200 metres this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
